page.title: 12LIFE STYLES (CONT)
page.content:
ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES: Block A: Each house averaged 1.8 colour televisions, 0.3 black and white televisions, 0.4 videos, 1.0 fridges, 1.0 deep freezers, 0.4 computers, 0.7 dishwashers and 1.4 telephones. Block B: Each house averaged 1.0 colour televisions, 0.6 black and white televisions, 0.3 videos, 1.0 fridges, 0.7 deep freezers, 0.1 computers, 0 dishwashers and 0.9 telephones.
NOISE: In Block A, no-one thought the area was noisy. 20% thought Block B was. Most irritating noises were traffic (Block A) and radios (Block B).
